docs.lead_paragraph: About one in eight women take an antidepressant at some time during pregnancy, reports Roni Rabin in today's Science Times. But is it safe?
docs.abstract: Some new research shows that antidepressant use during pregnancy may be linked to certain problems in newborns.

docs.lead_paragraph: 7 P.M. (Lifetime) SHERRI Sherri Shepherd of ''The View'' moves to prime time in this new series about another Sherri who shares a few things -- single mother, part-time actress -- with the woman who plays her. After that, fiction takes over. This Sherri supports herself as a paralegal while trying to re-enter the dating scene after divorcing the husband who cheated on her. James Avery plays Sherri's father; Kali Rocha is her difficult boss; and Michael Boatman a potential beau. In this premiere episode Sherri learns that the 20-year-old girlfriend of her ex (Malcolm-Jamal Warner, above, with Ms. Shepherd) is pregnant. In the Season 2 premiere of ''Rita Rocks,'' at 7:30, Rita (Nicole Sullivan) takes her daughter, Hallie (Natalie Dreyfuss), to the doctor for a discussion about birth control and receives some unexpected news. 6 A.M. (Fox Business Network) IMUS IN THE MORNING The premiere of Don Imus's syndicated radio program on Fox Business Network. The show will be simulcast in high-definition and is to feature frequent appearances by FBN's Jenna Lee, Connell McShane and Ashley Webster.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Labor Department announced on Friday morning that the unemployment rate rose again, to 9.8 percent for September, the highest it's been during the economic downturn. While Obama administration advisers have said in recent months that they expect the rate could climb to 10 percent, this is the highest rate reached since 1983.
docs.abstract: The latest Labor Department report includes higher jobs loss figures than anticipated.
docs.snippet: The latest Labor Department report includes higher jobs loss figures than anticipated.
